items.sentence: I\'ve never trusted Tom and I doubt I ever will.
You\'re not half as clever as you think you are.
Do you really think we shouldn\'t be doing this?
Tom couldn\'t talk about his ordeal with anyone.
Could you please put some more wood on the fire?
Tom took his coat off and hung it in the closet.
I wonder if Tom knows where Mary\'s umbrella is.
You should tell Tom that Mary is planning to go.
Tom didn\'t know that Mary was going to be here.
Tom didn\'t know what time he needed to show up.
Tom and Mary asked John to stay for the weekend.
Both Tom and Mary were pretty busy this morning.
Tom lit the candle and then stared at its flame.
Tom lives in a mansion in the rich part of town.
Tom didn\'t say anything I hadn\'t heard before.
I know that you don\'t know how to speak French.
I\'m going to my sister\'s wedding this weekend.
Could we please talk about this some other time?
I had just closed the door when someone knocked.
I teach French at the high school up the street.
